name: kenshir0f-portfolio
author: Kenshiro Fujii
description: Next.js / Typescript / Firebase, hosted on cloud functions

scripts.build: yarn clean && tcm ./src && cpx ./src/**/*.css ./dist && tsc && next build ./dist && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp ./config/adminsdk.json ./dist && yarn create-public
scripts.watch-static: watch-run -i -p 'src/static/**' 'rm -rf dist/static && mkdir dist/static && cpx "src/static/**/*" dist/static'
scripts.create-public: mkdir -p dist/public && cp -r src/public/* dist/public && mkdir -p dist/public/static && cp -r src/static/* dist/public/static
